title: One-pan chicken and potatoes
ingredients: ['650g salad potatoes, halved', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '300g cooked chicken, cut into bite-sized chunks', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander (optional)', '2 garlic cloves, crushed (optional)']
